name: TheAtlantic
text: "[Trump] believes the United States is getting ripped off by the rest of the world. He sees allies, trade deficits, and immigrants as the primary national-security threats facing the country," @thomaswright08 writes: https://t.co/DuQJZJL9Pe

name: TheAtlantic
text: When predictive technologies systematically discriminate against people of color, adolescents are especially vulnerable, @kingavriel writes. https://t.co/4SI2BWJxpX

name: TheAtlantic
text: Books by Maurice Sendak, R. L. Stine, Stephen King, and more terrify children—for a good reason—in this week's #TheAtlanticBooksBriefing. From @cray_kate: https://t.co/J7H3AxRocP

name: TheAtlantic
text: The Atlantic Daily: For just the fourth time in our 163-year run, The Atlantic is endorsing a candidate. https://t.co/6WYfOFTKzb

name: TheAtlantic
text: "A Justice [Amy Coney] Barrett may be unlikely to topple the Affordable Care Act, but she’s a foot soldier in a conservative legal movement that has armed itself with the tools to subvert Congress’s ability to govern," @nicholas_bagley writes: https://t.co/kQ4wQcIwrF

name: TheAtlantic
text: In  “Early December in Croton-on-Hudson,” published in The Atlantic in 1967, @LouiseGluck_ recalls a blown tire on a trip to deliver Christmas presents. https://t.co/LQ2t01456Y

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Americans are not unusual in caring less about tragedies in countries other than their own. The atrocities committed against the Uighurs, however, attract less attention than they should in part because of whom they’re committed by," @shadihamid writes: https://t.co/Nx5K8m1jlZ

name: TheAtlantic
text: "To put it bluntly, the whole premise of originalism is nonsense in that it pretends to make the work of the Supreme Court look straightforward and mechanical," @SenAngusKing and @HC_Richardson write: https://t.co/znupTwbiuA

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @JeffreyGoldberg: "Sometimes, life is elsewhere. In some places, democracy, or what’s left of it, is truly under threat. One of those places is Hong Kong." -- @shadihamid:
https://t.co/YaHNT1eUTr

name: TheAtlantic
text: “Is Joe Rogan really nurturing a generation of smarter, healthier, more worldly men?” @DevinGordonX asks. “Or an army of conspiracy theorists and alt-right super soldiers?” https://t.co/hPaa25Yj2w
